long_description: The fully padded Arc'teryx Miura 45 pack is a sleek crag bag that comfortably hauls gear with easy loading and access for a long day or quick overnight climbing adventure. Ergonomic shoulder straps are made with silicone-treated polyurethane to help shed dirt, snow and water; closed cell foam with spacer-mesh lining performs well in cold weather. Back panel is made with high-density polyethylene foam that provides support and structure, along with a comfortable point of contact against your back. 2 in. webbing hipbelt is light and adds stability and load distribution. Main compartment features a "surround" zipper that allows the pack to open completely flat for easy loading and access. Hydro port and tube clip accommodate a reservoir (sold separately) for on-the-go hydration. Store and organize small items with an internal zippered pocket, internal gear loop, top pocket with key clip, dual front zippered pockets and front daisy chains. Pack comes with an uninstalled front bungee attachment system that you can add to the front exterior for stowing bulky gear. The Arc'teryx Miura 45 pack is made with coated, 840-denier basket-weave nylon with an exceptionally smooth surface for increased durability.
